text: almulk walsltan fi hadha alyawm lilah whdh, wahu subhanah yaqdi bayn almuminin walkafryn. faladhin amanuu biallah warasulih waeamiluu al'aemal alsalht, lahum alnaeim alddayim fi aljnat. waladhin jahaduu whdanyt allah wakadhabuu rasulih wankru ayat alqran, fawlyk lahum eadhab yukhzihim wyhynhm fi jhnm
